trait.name: Sun Sickness
entries: While in sunlight, the myconid has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on {@variantrule D20 Test|XPHB|D20 Tests}. The myconid dies if it spends more than 1 hour in sunlight.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 1}, reach 5 ft. {@h}1 ({@damage 1d4 - 1}) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) Poison damage.

action.name: Rapport Spores
entries: The myconid expels spores in a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} originating from itself. Creatures in that area with an Intelligence score of 2 or higher that aren't Constructs, Elementals, or Undead gain telepathy with a range of 30 feet for 1 hour.
